tool_description:
With the Velocity MNP Lookup API, discover the portability status, current and original network names, MNC, MCC, OCN, and LRN for mobile phone number at a global scale.

With the fastest API in the sector and the widest coverage, Velocity is the perfect solution for addressing use cases such as A2P SMS and voice call routing around the world.
Identifying ported phone numbers between mobile service providers improves routing quality services by reducing costs and ensuring that messages reach t...
name: TMT Velocity
title: TMT Velocity

api_list.name: GET
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tmt-velocity.p.rapidapi.com/insert_number"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tmt-velocity.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://tmt-velocity.p.rapidapi.com/{number}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tmt-velocity.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
